attributes.action: Make Francis Maude work in a Petrol Station for a day.
attributes.additional_details:
Quite simply, the man is an idiot. He's brought the country to its knees through a stupid choice of words.

He's clearly inept. I doubt we can have him fired - that is the job of his constituents.. so we suggest a suitable  punishment would be to force him work a 16 hour shift in a Petrol station.

Then we can hurl abuse at him.
